thread.title: BRIEF-Puma Exploration And Trevali Mining Corporation Sign Definitive Option Agreement For The Murray Brook Project

title: BRIEF-Puma Exploration And Trevali Mining Corporation Sign Definitive Option Agreement For The Murray Brook Project

organizations.name: murray brook project reuters staff puma exploration inc

text:
April 30, 2018 / 7:15 PM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Puma Exploration And Trevali Mining Corporation Sign Definitive Option Agreement For The Murray Brook Project Reuters Staff
Puma Exploration Inc:
* PUMA EXPLORATION AND TREVALI MINING CORPORATION SIGN DEFINITIVE OPTION AGREEMENT FOR THE MURRAY BROOK PROJECT
* PUMA EXPLORATION - UNDER TERMS OF OPTION AGREEMENT, TREVALI WILL PROVIDE UP TO 7.5 MILLION DOLLARS FUNDING TO FINALIZE ACQUISITION OF MURRAY BROOK PROJECT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
